field.name: maxChars
field.label: Max. characters
field.description: The maximum number of characters allowed in this field. Description that foes over this limit will be trimmed.

field.name: stripSummaryTags
field.label: Strip all HTML tags in Summary view
field.description: Setting this to yes will remove all tags that could potentially affect when viewing a list of listings.

field.name: convertSpecialCharsInSummary
field.label: Use HTML Entities in Summary view
field.description: Setting this to yes will convert special characters such as ampersand, quotes, less than (<) and greater than (>) charaters to HTML entities in summary view.

field.name: stripDetailsTags
field.label: Strip all HTML tags in Details view
field.description: Setting this to yes will remove all tags except those that are specified in 'Allowed tags'.

field.name: parseUrl
field.label: Parse URL as link in Details view

field.name: stripAllTagsBeforeSave
field.label: Strip all HTML tags before storing to database
field.description: If WYSYWIG editor is enabled in the front-end, this feature allow you to strip any potentially harmful codes. You can still allow some tags within description field, which can be specified below.

field.name: allowedTags
field.label: Allowed tags
field.description: Enter the tag names seperated by comma. This parameter allow you to accept some HTML tags even if you have enable striping of all HTML tags above.

field.name: parseMambots
field.label: Parse Mambots
field.description: Enabling this will parse mambots codess within the description field

field.name: showReadMore
field.label: Show "Read More..."
field.description: Show "Read More.." if a description text clipped in Summary View.

field.name: whenReadMore
field.label: When to show "Read More.."
field.description: This allow you to set when to show the "Read More.." link.
